label: valueTolerance
comment: A tolerance specified for a value of this metric characteristic.
A tolerance specified for a value of this product batch characteristic.
A tolerance specified for a value of this product characteristic.
A tolerance specified for the value of this agricultural characteristic.
A tolerance specified for the value of this organization characteristic.
A tolerance specified for the value of this parameter.
A tolerance specified for the value of this process characteristic.
A tolerance specified for the value of this sustainability characteristic.
A tolerance specified for the value of this technical characteristic.

rangeIncludes.comment: Permissible limit or limits of variation that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.

domainIncludes.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of an agricultural object.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).
A prominent attribute or aspect of an organization.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
